original_title: In girum imus nocte et consumimur igni (a reprendre depuis le début)
overview: A manifesto; "Human life entails, in fact, the rage of seeing oneself as a back and forth movement from refuse to the ideal, and from the ideal to refuse, a rage that is easily directed against an organ as base as the foot." - Bataille
title: In girum imus nocte et consumimur igni (a reprendre depuis le début)
